name: Hellspain The Final Defense
description:
Protect Terra from forces of Hell, Control an uncanny band of Mercenaries in their final defense and destroy the Hellspawn from invading or DIE TRYING. 

Game Objective.

1) Do not let 10 enemies reach the portal behind the player. 
2) Do not die.

Controls

Movement W and  S  Rage Attack Spacebar Knight UI 1 Sun UI 2 Monk UI 3 Launch companion Left click on highlighted UI Cancel  Right click

Abilities Description:

Rage Attack: Killing enemies grants Rage, Once the rage is full press SPACEBAR to launch Rage Attack 

Companions: Pressing 1/2/3 will enable Companions UI, Left click on the highlighted Screen to launch the companion, Right click to cancel. All the companions goes to a cooldown period after use.
Knight: The Knight blocks the enemies in the lane for a short amount of time. 
Sun Priestess (AKA Sun):  Sun unleashes a solar beam that damages all the enemies in the lane and heals the player.
Monk: On Placing the Monk a mark will appear on the ground the 1st enemy who touches the mark will trigger Monk who deals high damage to all the enemies in the Area
